title: SO LONG RIOT
body:
[Riot Games Player Support] Re: I think my account was hacked

Aurelise
Aurelise (Riot Games Player Support)
Nov 12, 21:04 PST

Hello JanS,

I'm Aurelise and I'm part of the Riot Support team.

Your suspension was only issued after an extensive investigation was run to ensure your involvement in MMR boosting. As explained in the email you received in response to your suspension, the following actions have been taken on your account:

-A two-week suspension has been issued to your account.
-All previous Season rewards (Victorious skins, borders, season icons, season ward skins) have been stripped from your account.
-You are ineligible for any 2016 Season rewards

While you may feel that this punishment is too harsh, please realize that having accounts boosted, for whatever reason, ruins the spirit of League of Legends competitive play. While you are ineligible for any rewards in the 2016 Season, this does not disqualify you for anything pertaining to the 2017 Season. Keep in mind that if you have any future involvement in MMR boosting, your account will be permanently suspended.

More information, including the definition of Boosting can be found here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834-MMR-ELO-Boosting

Aurelise
Riot Games Player Support
Ahri ♡

Isellyn
Isellyn (Riot Games Player Support)
Nov 12, 11:34 PST

Summoner,

We have a Player Behavior team in place dedicated to working with these requests, so I need to transfer your ticket. A Player Behavior Specialist will be contacting you as soon as they can.

Please keep in mind that we respond to tickets in the order we receive them, so ‘bumping’ your ticket by sending us additional messages will send it to the back of our queue. This might inadvertently delay our response :(

Thank you for your patience!

Isellyn

Riot Games Billing and Account Support

JanS GeT R
JanS GeT RiGhT
Nov 11, 21:32 PST

I didn't play LOL for few month because there were some personal issues, and today I tried to come back to the League; however, I found that I got blocked until next month, 15th.
So I immediately changed password, and am requesting a help to you.
Do I just have to wait or do i have any options to unlock this?

-

Do u even look at questions?

replies.body: Looking at your history, looks like you were boosted in July and camped the Gold 1. No one is going to believe your story. Enjoy getting stripped of your rewards.

Thank you for realizing me but im not doing LOL anymore.
and I didnt play LOL for few month lol

Its really not hard for them to tell if you are lying or not haha

Hacked? Phished? then thats on you. Brute? they can easily tell.

IPs: they can tell each place you were logged in as.

I already replied but u gotta know that there were no responsibility for them.
They just used a FIXED answer.
I meant they were so irresponsible
I mean, to be fair, Aurelise is a complete ape. You'd probably get better help from a 6 year old.
